trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Fountain
There were no other sightings in Fountain on or around September 12th 2009
Summary: Bright Light high speed dimming and changing directions.
divs: Sighting DetailsI cannot remember the exact date of the event, but it was approximately 9:00 pm and the moon was at about the 10:00 position in the southeastern evening sky. I was sitting on my back porch relaxing smoking a cigar. No alcohol or drugs were being used whatsoever. I was looking towards the moon and from directly above my head at a considerable altitude, I saw a bright white light that was moving from the northwest to the southeast which appeared to be going at a significant speed. The object did not have any tail or stream. It went from an extreme bright light to a dim light which I could barely see because of the light of the moon. When it went dim, it took a sharp "right" turn towards the south. I watched as long as I could until it disappeared. At first I thought it may be a satellite, but I have never seen a satellite be extremely bright, turn dim, and change direction. I am 44 years old and have never seen a UFO in my life. I have always believed in the possibility of UFOs. I am retired Air Force and am very familiar with common aircraft movements and lighting in the night sky. I have never seen such a thing before.
